speaker: Narration
text: Kael enters the Hollow Market. The stench of god-flesh traders fills the air. Shadows move unnaturally, and whispers claw at your mind.

speaker: Godling
text: A trader offers forbidden knowledge... but at a terrible cost. Will you bargain?

speaker: Narration
text: Chaos erupts as guards and predators swarm the market. Kael must navigate the carnage, deciding whom to save and whom to abandon.

choices.text: Save a group of trapped humans.
Focus solely on your own escape.
Set a trap for the predators.

speaker: Narration
text: A pack of predators closes in. Humans scatter — will you use others as bait, fight alone, or manipulate the predators?

speaker: Narration
text: Kael slips into a hidden alley, breathing hard. Graffiti marks warn of the temple ahead and those who entered never returned. A shadow seems to watch him.

speaker: Narration
text: A spectral guardian emerges, eyes glowing. It tests Kael’s strength and will. Respect earns guidance; aggression brings injury.

speaker: Godling
text: A vision in the forbidden temple tempts you: deeper merge, greater power, but risk of losing yourself.

speaker: Narration
text: Kael encounters the temple’s inner sanctum: a series of intricate glyphs and traps. He must solve the puzzle to proceed, risking injury or madness.

choices.text: Solve it carefully using knowledge from murals.

speaker: Narration
text: Paths diverge: your bond with the godling and your past choices determine your next challenge.
